title: [RIDGELINE] Walking the Heck out of Thailand
content:
Ridgeliners!
Thank you all for the rapturous response to the TBOT announcement. We’ve finally shipped almost all of the orders, caught up with the rush, and new orders are now being tackled next business day. You can (probably?) still sneak a TBOT in before Christmas. Grab a copy here.
Onward to the latest issue about a walk in Thailand I recently completed:
It was hot. I was sweating. We — were sweating.
